reviews.title: Man app
reviews.comment: I can feel this app like a steering wheel....ITS DRIVING ME THROUGH THE TUNNEL OF LOVE..DAVID DAVIS FROM DESOTO, TEXAS...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not good, but not bad
reviews.comment: Its pretty precise and to the point, but whoever wrote this seems to have a lot of false confidence and very controlling. The entire app has somewhat decent tips but he tries to manipulate your mind BIG TIME! Like everything he says to do is the only way to do it and any other way is wrong and won\'t work. And he makes a point of that in every paragraph. There are many ways to pick up a woman, not just his way like in he says in this app. Also, most of the tips and strategies seem incomplete after reading them. After every tip he wrote, he leaves you saying \"okay then what?\" Kinda like a good movie building up excitement and tension, but has no ending. The advice, again, is okay but approach with caution and remember, there are so many more ways than this to pick up/attract a girl. Good luck!
reviews.author: Brandon Savary
